name: Bee and Bubbles
description:
Bee and Bubbles is a super flying adventure game that require fast reactions to help Bee to reach its destination carefully.
It's very easy to play, just touch the screen at the right time to move up, ovoid collision with bubbles and earn as many points as you can.
Bee and Bubbles is an exciting endless game for kids (girls and boys), of all ages, with special effects and high score system.
It’s guaranteed to be the most funny game you’ve ever had on your device.
